title: Urusei Yatsura Movie 4: Lum the Forever
alternative_title: うる星やつら ラム・ザ・フォーエバー
description: Strange things begin happening in Tomobiki Town...When a great cherry tree, "Tarozakura" is cut down while Lum & Co. are making a movie, Lum loses her horns-and her powers! Thus begins the strangest and most lyrical of the Urusei Yatsura movies...
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>]
